Posts.Content:
Just been for annual check up
Mammogram is fine
Bone scan for leg pain is just wear and tear but showed somet n nothing on right side of chest, had no treatments or operations on right side so not concerned then doctor checked my bust and said my right side she felt thickening so on over cautious side referring me for a scan
Should I be worried???? I had bc in left bust 4yrs ago
Posts.Title: Thickening around breast
